issue.title: [CF 679] Additional holy power requirements check
issue.body:
As holy pala I'm trying to check holy power, to cast a spell (let's say word of glory) at 5 holy power, but see faded icon at 3 and invisible if lower. Using "Reactive Ability" I can't set requirements to fade icon at lower holy power and using "Conditional Icon" it is dimmed all the way.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Setup reactive ability for word of glory with condition of holy power. Example at the end of ticket.
2. ??? I'm stuck here

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
On "Main" tab I would like another requirement for "min holy power" to dimm icon if failed - this would be set to "x == 5" for the export below.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v6.0.3

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Setup I'm using:
^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SStackMin^N4 ^SStackAlpha^N0.5 ^SName^S130551 ^SPBarOffs^S0 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SHOLY_POWER ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N3 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SOperator^S> ^SName^SDivine~`Purpose ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N60345^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user amiro | Imported from CurseForge issue #679 | Raw

comments.body:
A three-tiered resource checking system just isn't something that I could see fitting into TellMeWhen in any way.

There is, however, a way that you can accomplish this setup using multiple icons. Here is an export string that should do what you want:

^1^T^SScale^N1 ^SEnabled^B ^SColumns^N3 ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SType^Sconditionicon ^SAlpha^N0.6 ^SStackMin^N4 ^SStackAlpha^N0.5 ^SName^SWord~`of~`Glory ^SPBarOffs^S0 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon2 ^STexts^T ^N1^S[AltP("player",~`9)] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^S85673 ^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SHOLY_POWER ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N3 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N2^T ^SType^Sconditionicon ^SStackMin^N4 ^SStackAlpha^N0.5 ^SName^SWord~`of~`Glory ^SPBarOffs^S0 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon2 ^STexts^T ^N1^S[AltP("player",~`9)] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^S85673 ^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SHOLY_POWER ^SLevel^N5 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N3^T ^SType^Smeta ^SIcons^T ^N1^STellMeWhen_Group1_Icon2 ^N2^STellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^t^t^N60418^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N1 ^^

The meta icon is what will actually display information to you. You can move it where ever you like. I added holy power counters to the icons - you can remove these in the Text Displays options for each icon if you do not want them. I also removed the second condition that was on your original icon. If you want it back, you should probably add it to the meta icon.

As always, let me know if you need any more help with this, or with anything else!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
